name.ja: インスタントフラッシュカード
name.th: แฟลชการ์ดทันที

short.ar: بطاقات فلاش فورية: تحويل المواقع إلى بطاقات تعليمية، وتعزيز الذاكرة والدراسة بشكل أكثر ذكاءً
short.am,da,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fi,he,: Instant Flash Cards: Turn sites into flashcards, boost memory & study smarter
short.bg: Незабавни флаш карти: Превърнете сайтовете във флаш карти, увеличете паметта и учете по-умно
short.bn: তাত্ক্ষণিক ফ্ল্যাশ কার্ড: সাইটগুলিকে ফ্ল্যাশকার্ডে পরিণত করুন, মেমরি বাড়ান এবং আরও স্মার্ট অধ্যয়ন করুন৷
short.ca: Targetes flash instantànies: converteix els llocs en targetes flash, millora la memòria i estudia més intel·ligent
short.cs: Okamžité flash karty: Proměňte stránky na flash karty, rozšiřte paměť a studujte chytřeji
short.de: Sofortige Lernkarten: Verwandeln Sie Websites in Lernkarten, steigern Sie das Gedächtnis und lernen Sie intelligenter
short.el: Instant Flash Cards: Μετατρέψτε τοποθεσίες σε flashcards, ενισχύστε τη μνήμη και μελετήστε πιο έξυπνα
short.es: Tarjetas flash instantáneas: convierta sitios en tarjetas didácticas, aumente la memoria y estudie de forma más inteligente
short.et: Kiirmälukaardid: muutke saidid mälukaartideks, suurendage mälu ja õppige nutikamalt
short.fa: فلش کارت های فوری: سایت ها را به فلش کارت تبدیل کنید، حافظه را تقویت کنید و هوشمندتر مطالعه کنید
short.fil: Mga Instant Flash Card: Gawing flashcard ang mga site, palakasin ang memorya at mas matalinong mag-aral
short.fr: Cartes Flash instantanées : transformez des sites en cartes mémoire, augmentez la mémoire et étudiez plus intelligemment
short.gu: ત્વરિત ફ્લેશ કાર્ડ્સ: સાઇટ્સને ફ્લેશકાર્ડ્સમાં ફેરવો, મેમરીમાં વધારો કરો અને વધુ સ્માર્ટ અભ્યાસ કરો
short.hr: Instant Flash kartice: Pretvorite stranice u flash kartice, poboljšajte memoriju i učite pametnije
short.hu: Azonnali flash kártyák: Változtassa a webhelyeket kártyákká, növelje a memóriát és tanuljon okosabban
short.id: Kartu Flash Instan: Ubah situs menjadi kartu flash, tingkatkan memori & belajar lebih cerdas
short.it: Schede flash istantanee: trasforma i siti in flashcard, potenzia la memoria e studia in modo più intelligente
short.ja: インスタント フラッシュ カード: サイトをフラッシュカードに変換し、記憶力を高め、よりスマートに学習できるようにします。
short.kn: ತತ್‌ಕ್ಷಣ ಫ್ಲ್ಯಾಶ್ ಕಾರ್ಡ್‌ಗಳು: ಸೈಟ್‌ಗಳನ್ನು ಫ್ಲ್ಯಾಷ್‌ಕಾರ್ಡ್‌ಗಳಾಗಿ ಪರಿವರ್ತಿಸಿ, ಮೆಮೊರಿಯನ್ನು ಹೆಚ್ಚಿಸಿ ಮತ್ತು ಚುರುಕಾಗಿ ಅಧ್ಯಯನ ಮಾಡಿ
short.ko: 인스턴트 플래시 카드: 사이트를 플래시 카드로 바꾸고, 기억력을 높이고, 더 스마트하게 공부하세요.
short.lv: Tūlītējās zibatmiņas kartes: pārveidojiet vietnes par zibatmiņas kartēm, palieliniet atmiņu un mācieties gudrāk
short.ml: തൽക്ഷണ ഫ്ലാഷ് കാർഡുകൾ: സൈറ്റുകളെ ഫ്ലാഷ് കാർഡുകളാക്കി മാറ്റുക, മെമ്മറി വർധിപ്പിക്കുക, മികച്ച രീതിയിൽ പഠിക്കുക
short.mr: झटपट फ्लॅश कार्ड्स: साइटला फ्लॅशकार्डमध्ये बदला, मेमरी वाढवा आणि चाणाक्ष अभ्यास करा
short.ms: Kad Flash Segera: Tukar tapak menjadi kad imbas, tingkatkan ingatan & belajar dengan lebih bijak
short.nl: Instant Flash Cards: verander sites in flashcards, vergroot het geheugen en studeer slimmer
short.no: Instant Flash-kort: Gjør nettsteder til flashkort, øk minnet og studer smartere
short.sl: Takojšnje bliskovne kartice: spremenite spletna mesta v bliskovne kartice, povečajte pomnilnik in se učite pametneje
short.sr: Инстант Фласх картице: Претворите сајтове у флеш картице, повећајте меморију и учите паметније
short.sv: Instant Flash Cards: Förvandla webbplatser till flashcards, öka minnet och studera smartare
short.te: తక్షణ ఫ్లాష్ కార్డ్‌లు: సైట్‌లను ఫ్లాష్‌కార్డ్‌లుగా మార్చండి, మెమరీని పెంచండి & తెలివిగా అధ్యయనం చేయండి
short.th: แฟลชการ์ดทันใจ: เปลี่ยนไซต์ให้เป็นแฟลชการ์ด เพิ่มหน่วยความจำและศึกษาอย่างชาญฉลาดยิ่งขึ้น
short.tr: Anında Flash Kartlar: Siteleri bilgi kartlarına dönüştürün, hafızayı güçlendirin ve daha akıllıca çalışın
short.uk: Миттєві флеш-карти: перетворюйте сайти на флеш-картки, збільшуйте пам’ять і навчайтеся розумніше
short.vi: Thẻ Flash tức thì: Biến trang web thành thẻ ghi chú, tăng cường trí nhớ và học tập thông minh hơn

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meet Instant Flash Cards - the app that’s changing the game for learners everywhere. From cramming for finals to  prepping for exams, we’ve got you covered. And yeah, it works magic on any website content, turning it into flashcards with just one click. 📚✨


Why You’ll Be Obsessed with Instant Flash Cards

Instant Genius Mode: One tap turns boring web pages into your study playground. Get ready to soak up knowledge like a pro.

Memory On Fleek: Flashcards are like brain food, and we’re serving up the good stuff. Boost your memory and keep those facts locked in.

Study Smarter, Not Harder: Available on all your fave platforms like Chrome, Edge, Safari, and Firefox. Keep your study vibes strong, anywhere, anytime.


 💰 Pricing

For just $15 a year (yeah, that’s less than your monthly coffee splurge), you unlock the ultimate study hack. We’re talking about endless flashcards, progress tracking, and all the interactive learning you can handle. Why $15? Because we’re committed to giving you a top-notch app that’s always ad-free, super reliable, and loaded with the latest features. It’s an investment in your brainpower, and trust us, it pays off.

🧠 Why Instant Flash Cards Slaps:

Click and Learn: Websites to flashcards in a snap? Yes, please.

Track Yo’ Self: See how much of a genius you’re becoming over time.

Fun Learning: Who said studying can’t be a good time?


 📚 Get In On This:

Instant Flash Cards is more than an app; it’s your ticket to crushing goals and slaying exams. Forget about dull study sessions; we’re here to make learning lit, effective, and something you actually look forward to.

🔥 Ready to Boss Up Your Brain?

Slide into the app store and hit up Instant Flash Cards. For the cost of a few lattes, you’re unlocking a year of turbocharged learning. Don’t just study—study smart, make it fun, and stay ahead of the game. Your brain (and your future self) will thank you.

🆘 Support

Email: hello@coffeeandfun.com
Helperbird Support Page: https://www.coffeeandfun.com/



🇮🇪 Proudly founded by a dyslexic software engineer in Ireland, fueled by coffee & Fun LLC.
